column4: can someone tell me what KDE is, how to install it and how to enable it please
I think Ill leave KDE alone
KDE is a desktop interface similiar to gnome
synaptic or apt-get will install it with a smiple command

Im looking at the link and it seems that it will install loads of new stuff.  i want to be able to use the Gnome setup I have now as well,  can I switch between them on the sessions menu at login like i can with xfce and gnome
Iit wont intefere with or bork anything thats already on here will it?
nope it will act just like another session, there may be a few conflicts but in the end it should be just fine
they actually work realyl well together
nothing serious maybe a file here or there but it won't mess anything up
no it will be fine, in fact I do that myself with gnome and kde, their quite compatable.  No worries on this one
its downloaded and alm,ost installed now, no turmning back i guess
I promise you, you will be fine 8)
yup 8)  Ubuntu Ultimate does teh work for you 8)
